Release History

VersionDateDescription
0.330.04.2011

Release 0.3 - 30.04.2011

TypeChangesBy
Added example licenses.xml file which is available as download into src/site/resources folder.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Changed the name of the verbose property into mlv.verbose and added new integration test to check the system property mlv.verboseKarl Heinz Marbaise
Added large amount of documentation and set the prerequisite to Maven 2.2.1Karl Heinz Marbaise
Changed the default location of the licenses.xml file from src/main/licenses/licenses.xml to src/licenses/licenses.xml and changed the integration tests accordingly.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Changed the artifactId to maven-license-verifier-pluginKarl Heinz Marbaise
Get it running with Maven 3.0.3Karl Heinz Marbaise
Refactored code into a single module to get a simpler release cycle.Karl Heinz Marbaise

Release 0.2 - xx.xx.2010

TypeChangesBy
Problem with NPE, based on missing data in licenses file. Fixes 297. Thanks to Laurent Perez.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Change struture project to separate verifier code from plugin code. Fixes 295.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Added missing description and issueManagement section.Karl Heinz Marbaise

Release 0.1 - 19.02.2010

TypeChangesBy
Report has not been created during integration test (basicReporTest). Fixes 290.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Replaced xstream usage with Maven Modello Fixes 288.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Use references @project.artifactId@ and @project.groupId@ instead of hard coded values in integration-tests. Fixes 283.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Wrong groupId in integration test pom for maven-compiler-plugin. Fixes 282.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Introduced Id field for License Fixes 276, 280.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Changed groupId Fixes 279, 274.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Problem with XML fragment in Unit Test fixed. Fixes 275.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Added OSS Sonatype Snapshot/Staging repository. Fixes 272.Karl Heinz Marbaise
Added distributionManagement part to pom. Fixes 257.Karl Heinz Marbaise
